description: This file defines a FastAPI router for querying a Supabase database, including data models, utility functions for applying filters, ordering, and pagination, and an endpoint for executing parameterized queries against a specified table.

classes.name: SupabaseFilter
classes.description: Represents a single filter on a column with an operator and a value.

classes.name: SupabaseQueryResponse
classes.description: Response schema for Supabase table queries.

methods.name: _validate_enabled_or_404
methods.description: Raises HTTP 404 or 503 if Supabase is not enabled or not properly configured.

methods.name: _apply_filters
methods.description: Applies a list of filters to a Supabase query object.

methods.name: _apply_order
methods.description: Applies ordering to a Supabase query object based on provided column and direction.

methods.name: _apply_pagination
methods.description: Applies limit and offset to a Supabase query object and returns metadata.

methods.name: supabase_query
methods.description: FastAPI endpoint to execute a parameterized query on a specified Supabase table, supporting filters, ordering, and pagination.
